attributes.action: Save our fish from over fishing!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: World stocks of fish are being depleted due to over fishing. Species such as cod, haddock and blue fin tuna are all at risk of becoming extinct! This is a very worrying concept but time hasent run out, our country needs to take action of illegal fishing and create protected no go areas for fishing. Farmed fish is just as insustainable as it requires masses of smaller fish i.e anchovies to feed the farmed fish this is not sustainable! Please lets make a difference the fish are vital to our Earths eco system sign up today to make a difference!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
